title: Plymouth Linux Graphical Boot Manager Now Better Handles Display Rendering
description:
Plymouth graphical boot splash screen for Linux systems gets a new plugin for rendering text, a new splash mode for indicating factory reset progress, and other changes in new release.

The post Plymouth Linux Graphical Boot Manager Now Better Handles Display Rendering appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: TUXEDO Control Center 2.1 Released with Exciting New Functions
description:
TUXEDO Control Center 2.1 is rolling out now to all TUXEDO laptop users with revised dashboard, customizable fan control, new battery charging profiles, and more.

The post TUXEDO Control Center 2.1 Released with Exciting New Functions appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
